question: Who has been appointed as the Chairman-Cum-Managing director (CMD) of Coal India Limited?
explanation: Anil Kumar Jha was appointed as the chairman-cum-managing director (CMD) of Coal India Limited (CIL). Anil Kumar Jha is currently the CMD of Mahanadi Coalfields Ltd. He has been appointed as the chairman-cum-managing director (CMD) of Coal India Limited till his superannuation on 31st January 2020.
